byline.contributor: Campbell Robertson and Niraj Chokshi contributed reporting.

abstract: At least seven people have died in massive flooding in southern Louisiana; more than 11,000 people remain in 70 shelters; flooding is expected to continue for several days.

headline.print_headline: Floods in Louisiana Leave at Least 7 Dead

snippet: Rain swollen rivers and creeks have inundated parishes, and the authorities fear more areas could become flooded as rainfall is forecast this week....
lead_paragraph: Rain swollen rivers and creeks have inundated parishes, and the authorities fear more areas could become flooded as rainfall is forecast this week.
